answer: If you're willing to visit filming locations on your own the LOTR Location Guidebook is nice. Often local tour operators will cover the filming locations nearby or even offer specific half day or day tours to more remote harder to reach places. If there's anything LOTR related to see in the area there will always be someone more than willing to show it to you.
